attributes.action: Continue to allow the freedom to protest in this country, without imposing any further restrictions on it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been created in order for those who oppose calls for the outlawing of the right to protest against the military to be able to show there is a large body of support for the maintenance of freedom of speech in this country. This is not about supporting the troops or not, it is about the need to uphold the right to protest peacefully.
